abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column profiles Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Rich Hill, who bounced between majors and minors for years before breakout season in 2016 that helped earn him earn three-year contract with Dodgers.
lead_paragraph: Hill, a 36-year-old journeyman, bounced between the majors and the minors, and starting and relieving, before a breakout 12-5 season in 2016 that helped earn him a three-year $48 million deal.
snippet: Hill, a 36-year-old journeyman, bounced between the majors and the minors, and starting and relieving, before a breakout 12-5 season in 2016 that helped earn him a three-year $48 million deal....

headline.main: Perseverance Pays Off for Dodgers Pitcher Rich Hill
headline.print_headline: Love and Perseverance Pay Off for Pitcher
